Massimo Mannino poses for a photo which would eventually become his Twitter profile picture PERIOD

East Carolina University alumni and former mens tennis player Massimo Mannino has been named to Forbes  Under  list PERIOD

The list celebrates the  most influential people under the age of  in categories such as education healthcare and technology among others PERIOD

Mannino was named to the list under the technology category because of his work as the cofounder of the data company Novalytica and the career platform DataCareer PERIOD

Its an honor to have made the Forbes  Under  Mannino said PERIOD

After graduating from ECU Mannino earned a PhD in economics from the University of St PERIOD Gallen in his home country of Switzerland PERIOD

My time as a student athlete at ECU has taught me how to deal with pressure use my time efficiently and keep fighting when things are not going well. mannino said PERIOD

Mannino played for the ECU tennis team during the  and  seasons PERIOD
